name: Files snatcher
description:
Files - snatcher

Oh no!

Professor Dr JameGam is trying to take over the world, with his super evil computer. 

Now it is on you to help Viry!

Viry is a virus, made to infect the evil computer, but he needs assistence in reaching the end and escaping from the firewall

Collect data for bonus points and avoid the anti-virus robots.

Or find the hidden Mode to play a less stressing Version and concentrate on gathering ALL Files but in the least Time.

Controls

Keyboard / Gamepad

Move: A / D or left stick

Jump: Space or south button 

Pause: ESC

You can also wall / double jump!

Can you beat our developer score?  ->

Normal Mode

1st Place: Leon [Files: 5175 - Time: 235]

Feel free to post a screenshot of your Score down in the Comments! Show us what your got!

Game Design : Together as a team :)

How to install

1. Download the ZIP file

2. Unpack the file

3. Open the .exe

4. Enjoy!


This was made as a part of the htk GAME JAM | 2022 Fire Edition
